content: Well, so that really depends how deep you think the recession will be, and the -- what the next year brings, I mean, clearly, if you think it's going to be a quicker recovery, then clearly the bounce back will be just as much quicker. So it's clearly, I think the way it is if you -- you're not changing your plans, but what you're doing is you're spreading it over more quarters, thereby reducing your quarterly cash burn. But I don't think it's, but I do think the -- you may see like 5%, pullback or something, or maybe they'll push out the orders by a quarter.
